content: this pattern is a textured twist on the classic 1x1 ribbed beanie it uses the seed stitch to separate the vertical knit columns instructions available for knitting flat or in the round pattern available in the following sizes * child head circumference up to 53cm 21in * adult s/m head circumference up to 58cm 23in * adult l head circumference up to 64cm 25in this hat is knit using peer gynt yarn by sandnes garn two skeins should be enough for all sizes
